title: Teapot Tales
description: With 35 stories, including 2 poems, written by 21 different authors, Teapot Tales is a wonderful collection of short stories, each story just long enough to enjoy with a cup of tea. With stories to enchant readers of all ages, these fairy tales pull you into their own magical worlds. From twists on the classic fairy tales of old to completely new fairy tales, let these 35 fairy tales sweep you away into the realm of fantasy.
author: Rebecca Fyfe
